decision_conditions: The development to which this consent relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date on which the original consent (Ref PP/2013/5514 dated 17/03/2014) was granted.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers 11723-PLF-020 C, 11723-PLF-021 A, 11723-PLF_022 A, 11723-PLF_23, Covering Letter dated 24th February 2023, TeamSport Operation and Management Statement dated February 2023, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local Planning Authority.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| The use of the premises hereby approved shall not commence before 08:00 and shall cease at 23:30.

Reason: In the interests of the living conditions of occupiers of nearby properties and in accordance with policies 1.1 (e) of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policy 7A of the Ealing Adopted Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), and policy D3, D4 and D14 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| Condition deleted. | This permission shall be personal to Go Karting for Fun Limited for the purposes of an indoor go karting operation and shall not endure for the benefit of the land. On Go Karting for Fun Limited vacating the premises, the use of the land shall revert back to Class B8 warehouse use.

Reason: To enable the local planning authority to maintain strict control over the nature of the use in order to restrict the use of the premises to one compatible with the surrounding area, in accordance with policies 1.(c), (d) and (e), 1.2 (d), 2.5 (d) & 6.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policy 4C of the Ealing adopted Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), and policies SD9, S5 and E9 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| Condition deleted. | The equipment shall be installed and constructed in accordance with the approved scheme and recommendations made in the Hann Tucker acoustic report dated 24th February 2014, ref: 19789/JR/A and shall be implemented in their entirety before use commences, and permanently retained thereafter.

Reason: To comply with the terms of the application and in the interests of the living conditions of occupiers of nearby properties and in accordance with Interim SPG 10, policy 1.1 (e) of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policy 7A of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), and policy D14 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| The use shall be conducted in accordance with the TeamSport Operation and Management Statement dated February 2023 and shall operate with electrically powered karts, and at no time shall petrol powered karts be used.

Reason: To comply with the terms of the application and in the interests of the living conditions of occupiers of nearby properties and in accordance with Interim SPG 10, policies 1.1 (e) of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policy 7A of the Ealing Adopted Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), and policy D14 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| The framework Travel Plan shall be continuously monitored and operated by Teamsport for the lifetime of the use.

Reason: In order to promote sustainable transport modes and encourage the use of alternatives to car travel in accordance with policy 3.1 of the DPD and policy 1.1 of the Ealing Local Development Framework Core Strategy (2012).

| The development shall be undertaken in accordance with recommendation of the Energy & Sustainability Statement dated November 2013, which shall be completed prior to the first occupation of the development hereby approved and thereafter permanently retained and maintained, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.

Reason: To ensure that the development hereby approved is energy efficient and to contribute to the avoidance of need for new fossil fuel or other primary energy generation capacity and to reduce emissions of greenhouse gases,in accordance with the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies SI1, SI2 and SI3 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| The sound insulation of the building envelope and of any mitigation measures shall ensure that noise from internal uses, activities and plant is contained within the building, as assessed according to standards of the Council's SPG10 and criteria of BS8233:2014, at the nearest and most affected noise sensitive premises incl. offices and external amenity spaces. Measures shall be implemented prior use of the outside the hours of 09:00 on any day to 22:30 on Sunday to Thursday, and at 23:00 on Fridays and Saturdays, and retained permanently thereafter.

Reason: To ensure that the amenity of occupiers of the development site/ surrounding premises is not adversely affected by noise, in accordance with Policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and D14 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| The use outside the hours of 09:00 on any day to 22:30 on Sunday to Thursday, and to 23:00 on Fridays and Saturdays, shall not commence until all external doors to the premises have been fitted with self-closing devices, which shall be maintained in an operational condition and at no time shall any external door nor windows be fixed in an open position during the emission of noise, smell, smoke, or fumes.

Reason:  To ensure that the amenity of occupiers of the development site/ surrounding premises is not adversely affected by noise /odour /smoke /fumes, in accordance with Policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and D14 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| The individual and combined external sound level emitted from plant, machinery or equipment at the development site shall be lower than the lowest existing background sound level by at least 5dBA, as measured at/ calculated to the nearest and most affected noise sensitive premises at the development site and at surrounding premises. The assessment shall be made in accordance with BS4142:2014 +A1 2019, with all machinery operating together at maximum capacity.

Reason:   To ensure that the amenity of occupiers of the development site/ surrounding premises is not adversely affected by noise from mechanical installations/ equipment, in accordance with Policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and D14 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary (condition no.3 work hours)(condition no.8 operation statement) and remove (condition no.4 Noise Levels)(condition no.6 Mechanical Ventilation) in relation to planning permission reference PP/2013/5514 dated 17/03/2014 for: Change of use, including alterations to existing mezzanine level, to provide for an indoor go karting facility, with ancillary bar and staff facilities (Sui Generis); external alterations to front elevation and associated parking (Departure Planning Application)
